name: UIDT v3.5: Unified Information-Density Theory - DESI-Optimized Framework
description: This software suite provides the canonical implementation and verification environment for the Unified Information-Density Theory (UIDT) v3.5. It includes scripts for the parameter-free derivation of the Yang-Mills Mass Gap (1.710 GeV), the calculation of the Universal Gamma Invariant (16.339), and the simulation of cosmological observables (H0, S8, w(z)) calibrated to DESI DR2 data. The repository adheres to the highest standards of reproducibility with Monte Carlo validation (N=100,000) and explicit evidence classification.
citation: Rietz, P. (2025). Unified Information-Density Theory v3.5: DESI-Optimized Framework. Zenodo. https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.17835201
